titles: A feast full of sad cheere vvhere griefes are all on heape: where sollace is full deere, and sorrowes are good cheape.
author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.
publisher: Printed [by John Charlewood?] for VVilliam Holme, and are to be sold at his shoppe, neere the great north doore of Paules,
notes: By Thomas Churchyard, whose name appears in the heading to the dedication.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
